policies.title: Policies
policies.subtitle: Privacy policy and Terms of use
policies.privacy.title: Privacy policy
policies.privacy.body: We are committed to protecting your personal data. We use information to improve the service and contact when needed, and we do not share it with third parties except by law.
policies.terms.title: Terms of use
policies.terms.1: Use the platform under local laws.
policies.terms.2: Keeping your information up to date is your responsibility.
policies.terms.3: We may update the terms with prior notice.
policies.cookies.title: Cookies
policies.cookies.body: We use cookies to improve performance and analyze usage. You can adjust settings from the browser.
